title: Samurai Jack, Vol. 1: The Threads of Time
description: The legendary samurai known only as "Jack" is stranded in a strange future ruled by the demonic wizard, Aku. His quest to return back to the past has tested him many times, but now the stakes are higher than ever. Can an ancient relic known as the Rope of Eons finally take him home? Collects issues #1â€“5.
author: Jim Zub
